name: Casino Party: Coin Pusher
description:
Welcome to Vegas! It's time to roll your dice, shuffle your cards and count your chips. While you’re at it, why not try your luck on the Jackpot. We have brought together the shimmering casino lights, the fountains, the billboards, the tables, the slots, basically the ultimate Vegas experience to your device. Make sure you win all you can, and have fun doing it because what happens in Vegas, stays in Vegas!
Push coins, win prizes, unlock quests, upgrade your abilities and use power-ups strategically to maximize your rewards. It’s the perfect pastime! With simple gameplay and fantastic physics, Casino Party is easy to pick up and fun to play for hours on end. Join thousands of players on the sweetest coin pushing experience on the app store.

.:: SPECIAL PRIZES ::.
Win all of these special prizes:
- Helicopters
- Limos
- Chapels
- Guitars
- Slot Machines
- Roulettes
- Rings
- Royal Flushes
- Piggy Banks
- Mugs

.:: SPECIAL CHIPS ::.
Bank all of these special chips to boost your rewards:
- Gold Bar Chip (rewards you with a gold bar)
- XP Chip (rewards you with bonus XP)
- Power-Up Chip (rewards you with a power-up)
- Blitz Chip (rewards you with a coin shower)
- Comet Chip (rewards you with a comet shower)
- Portal Chip (rewards you with a portal that moves all coins to your bank)
- Prize Chip (rewards you with a special prize)
- Buck Chip (rewards you with party bucks)
- Joker Chip (rewards you with one of the above special chips)

.:: UPGRADES ::.
Upgrade all your game abilities to become a pro:
- Offline Regeneration (reduces the time to regenerate number of coins when offline)
- Regeneration Max (increases the max number of coins you can generate when offline)
- Chips Luck (spawns rarer coins on your game table)

.:: POWER-UPS ::.
Use all these power-ups to energize your game table:
- Mega Dozer (enables an extended dozer that pushes even more coins into your bank)
- Card Shield (enables a shield of cards so none of your coins or prizes goes into the gutter)
- Dice Roll (rolls dice on the game table pushing more and more coins and prizes into your bank)
- Table Shake (shakes the game table to rig it and push all your coins and prizes into your bank)
- Vegas Winds (releases a tornado that rampages on the game table pushing all coins and prizes into your bank)

.:: QUESTS ::.
How many of the 70 quests can you unlock? Compete with your friends and see who becomes the ultimate coin explorer first.

.:: PARTY SLOTS ::.
Feeling lucky? Head over to the slots and bet gold bars to multiply your rewards. Will you win the jackpot?

.:: FORTUNE WHEEL ::.
Got a spin token? Spin the fortune wheel and hang on to your seat as the wheel slows down towards your reward.

.:: LEADERBOARDS/ACHIEVEMENTS ::.
See how you're doing compared to everyone in our vibrant gamer community. Try to unlock all the achievements to become a real COIN MASTER!

Contact us at coinparty@mindstormstudios.com for any help or queries.
